title: Any questions?
creator_credit: Australian Film Commission, Victorian Film Corporation and Seven Dimensions
brief_description: Discussion starter looking at the problems of generating group discussions. After completing a complicated explanation, a trainer asks questions of the group. In his despair at failing to elicit questions he jumps out the window.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Film Commission, Victorian Film Corporation and Seven Dimensions
